remarks: The Knaster-Tarski theorem says that every monotone function over a complete lattice has a (least) fixpoint.  Here we specialize this theorem to the case when the lattice is the powerset lattice ` ~P A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
knatar.1 $e |- X = |^| { z e. ~P A | ( F ` z ) C_ z } $.
knatar $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ ( F ` A ) C_ A /\ A. x e. ~P A A. y e. ~P x ( F ` y ) C_ ( F ` x ) ) -> ( X C_ A /\ ( F ` X ) = X ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d X x y $.
